name: Go Dolphin!
description:
Go Dolphin! is a classic, arcade style, endless runner where you play as a dolphin racing through the dangerous ocean depths collecting as many air bubbles and treasure chests as possible, while trying to avoid floating mines and great white sharks!

This new take on a classic endless runner will keep you entertained for hours, if you are looking for a new game to play in your free time give Go Dolphin a try.

This is the first game from Drag N' Drop Entertainment so please leave us feedback and let us know what we should improve in this game and in our future games. We will do our best to fix any issues promptly and even add some of your ideas if we can!

Share this game with your friends and see who gets the highest score!
